verses.name: Ezekiel 45:14
verses.text: Concerning the ordinance of oil, the bath of oil, ye shall offer the tenth part of a bath out of the cor, which is an homer of ten baths; for ten baths are an homer:

verses.name: Ezekiel 45:15
verses.text: And one lamb out of the flock, out of two hundred, out of the fat pastures of Israel; for a meat offering, and for a burnt offering, and for peace offerings, to make reconciliation for them, saith the Lord God.

verses.name: Ezekiel 45:16
verses.text: All the people of the land shall give this oblation for the prince in Israel.
